description: In order to see what it was like to have a Pokémon battle, Thane got his father`s Pokémon so he and Glen could try battling with them. Glen used Thane`s Father`s Patrat to battle against Thane`s Father`s Blitzle who was commanded by Thane. The initial battle when on for quite awhile and both Thane`s Father`s Patrat and Thane`s Father`s Blitzle got exhausted from the battling and were finally both recalled by Thane as they are precious to his father and he didn`t want them to be injured.
name: Minezumi (Thane no Chichioya)
